ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Mean mean nasty Maestro
ygData.msgSnippet: Ugh 12 bugged horses at Phini...That happened to us a couple times. Phini supposed to have 4 swirlspine seahorse guards up top and 4 swirlspine guardians
ygData.messageBody:
Ugh 12 bugged horses at Phini...That happened to us a couple times. Phini
supposed to have 4 swirlspine seahorse guards up top and 4 swirlspine
guardians inside his lair. After we killed the regular swirls, we went to
pull and ended up with at least a dozen guardians + phini. We figured it out
though - well, what was causing the problem on our server anyways: Previous
failed attempts, causing the horses to get stuck, and something triggering a
spawn of additional horses. We called a GM and he reset the zone for us.

Sartori D'Elsiraad<Legion>
50th Bard of Veeshan



>From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <garramone@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@egroups.com
>To: "'eqbards@egroups.com'" <eqbards@egroups.com>
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Mean mean nasty Maestro
>Date: Wed, 12 Apr 2000 19:23:01 -0400
>
>nothing (until RoK) can possibly compare to a duel-wielding Dojorn. we've
>killed everything in this game many times over, and we have never faced
>anything nearly as difficult than when Dojo was duel-wielding. now that
>was
>a challenge and a lot of fun (and the first and last time i was in sky, i
>usually never have the time to put in up there). the only thing that
>killed
>me faster (sitting and singing is not a good idea when he gets pulled, ok
>so
>i wasn't paying attention i got a 1 1/2 year old) than Dojo that night was
>when i got a pull of 12 buggy guardians at phin. not that Inno's a
>cakewalk, but i am going with DW Dojo as the toughest =)
>
>Shada Powa, L50 Wood Elf Bard
>Tyria Sarkin, L49 High Elf Wizard
><Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
>
>
> > Combined with his
> > AE lifetap and buggy pathing, he was actually harder than
> > Innoruuk (who is widely regarded as the most difficult
> > god/dragon at the moment).
